unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste, car lovers! The automotive scene is sizzling hotter than a plate of momos right now. Several exciting vehicles have launched recently, promising a smoother ride from Kashmir to Kanyakumari.
normalised: Namaste, car lovers! The automotive scene is sizzling hotter than a plate of momos right now. Several exciting vehicles have launched recently, promising a smoother ride from Kashmir to Kanyakumari.

unnormalised: First up, Tata Motors dropped the all-new 'Punchy' SUV, and boy, does it pack a punch! It’s zippy and promises mileage that would make your wallet smile. Expect it in showrooms near you soon, starting at an attractive price of around Rs. 6 Lakh.
normalised: First up, Tata Motors dropped the all-new 'Punchy' S U V, and boy, does it pack a punch! It’s zippy and promises mileage that would make your wallet smile. Expect it in showrooms near you soon, starting at an attractive price of around rupees six lakh.

unnormalised: Then there's Maruti Suzuki, who unveiled their souped-up Brezza, boasting a spacious interior and a sunroof bigger than my auntie’s balcony (that’s saying something – it's easily 100 sq ft!).
normalised: Then there's Maruti Suzuki, who unveiled their souped-up Brezza, boasting a spacious interior and a sunroof bigger than my auntie’s balcony (that’s saying something – it's easily one hundred square feet!).

unnormalised: Dr. Mehta, head of ARAI, gave a thumbs-up to the new safety features being incorporated by these manufacturers.
normalised: Doctor Mehta, head of A R A I, gave a thumbs-up to the new safety features being incorporated by these manufacturers.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra teased their upcoming Thar EV concept. Imagine conquering Leh-Ladakh with zero emissions!
normalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra teased their upcoming Thar E V concept. Imagine conquering Leh-Ladakh with zero emissions!

unnormalised: Ashok Leyland also launched a new range of commercial vehicles aimed at boosting the logistics sector. Expect to see them hauling goods across the country.
normalised: Ashok Leyland also launched a new range of commercial vehicles aimed at boosting the logistics sector. Expect to see them hauling goods across the country.

unnormalised: Finally, remember to drive safe and buckle up! Don't be a Raju driving recklessly. Cheers!
normalised: Finally, remember to drive safe and buckle up! Don't be a Raju driving recklessly. Cheers!
